## NS.getServer() method

Returns a server object for the given server. Defaults to the running script's server if host is not specified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getServer(host?: Host): Server;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  host | [Host](./bitburner.host.md) | Optional. Hostname or IP for the requested server object. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Server](./bitburner.server.md)

The requested server object.

2 GB
